name: sqlite4
description: Secure embedded SQL database with encryption, access control, and enterprise features

scripts.test: node -e "const SQLite4 = require('./src/sqlite4.js'); const db = new SQLite4({dbPath: ':memory:'}); console.log(db.execute('CREATE TABLE test (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT)')); console.log(db.execute(\"INSERT INTO test (name) VALUES ('hello')\")); console.log(db.execute('SELECT * FROM test'));"

author: Katsuma
